entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
